channel.title: Sorry :(
channel.description:
Well, I'm back.. and I'm really sorry for the behavior that I had a few months ago.. I was a bit aggressive.. But now I promise I'll not be aggressive. :D
Sorry if I cussed at you in any of my posts before.
and yes, I know, my source was a bit gay..

item.title: Sorry :(
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Welcome back. These topics aren’t allowed though, sorry.

Read full topic
